name: Judge Project ALPHA
description:
J1 (Left) :

Attack = Z

Dodge = S

J2 (Right) : 

Attack = UpArrow

Dodge = DownArrow

Game :

Two number appear behind each player.

If your number is bigger, attack.

if your number is smaller, dodge.

If the number are the same, attack.

First to do something win, but if you do it wrong, you lose.
